Photo: Dan Kitwood, Getty Images Image 66 of 66 Blac Chyna gets tattoo of Future's name 1 / 66 Back to Gallery This brings relationship drama to a new and permanent level.
Blac Chyna reportedly got a tattoo of rapper Future's name on her hand, amid rumors the two are dating.
So why is this ink stirring the pot? Let's get you caught up: Future and pop star Ciara dated and have a kid together, a one-year old son also named Future. Blac Chyna, who is obviously so very secure in her relationship with Future, enters the picture and later gets his name tattooed on her hand.
And in the wise words of every infomercial star: But wait, there's more.
Blac Chyna posted a picture of her new ink on Instagram Sunday, aka Ciara's 30th birthday, with a lyric to one of Future's songs. Coincidence? Maybe. Does Ciara seem to care? Maybe not.
RELATED: Craziest celebrity Twitter feuds
Ciara, the Austin-native pop star, was probably still in party afterglow from Saturday, when she was seen letting loose with Beyonce (who came dressed as Storm from "X-Men") at a surprise party thrown by her new beau Russell Wilson.
Getting a spite tattoo, or partying with Beyonce? It looks like Ciara won this round, Blac Chyna.
Guess the celebrity tattoo in the gallery above.
